segments.text: Good morning , may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We'd like to take a tour to Florence .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's a beautiful city . When do you want to go there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have got a 2 weeks ' vocation and we plan to leave on Thursday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then please have a look at the table , there are so many plans .
segments.speaker: S1
